content:
I'm happy to help you with that! However, I need to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have access to real-time information, including current dates. I can only provide general information and advice.

If you're concerned about your hotel booking and the outstanding balance, I recommend checking your email or the Expedia website to confirm the exact deadline for payment. You can also contact Expedia's customer service directly to clarify the situation and get an update on your booking.

To find out the current date, you can simply check your calendar, phone, or computer. If you're unsure about the date, you can also ask a friend or family member to confirm it for you.

Remember to prioritize your travel arrangements and take care of any outstanding payments or bookings to avoid any potential issues or cancellations. If you have any further questions or concerns, feel free to ask!
